alert.note: Alert for Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 30 at 4:34PM EDT until August 30 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Piscataquis County in north central Maine... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 433 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chesuncook, or 20 miles northwest of Ripogenus, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Chesuncook and Northeast Carry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
